message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 is a bit high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $130. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great value for the product. I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $122 for the product. I think that's a fair price, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $128. This is as close to your target price as I can get. I think it's still a great value for the product, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. I think that's the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
